title: BMW Motorrad sales double to 5,191 units in India in 2021
description: Achieving the highest ever annual sales by a premium motorcycle brand in India, BMW Motorrad sold 5,191 motorcycles, posting a remarkable growth of 102.5 per cent as compared to 2020, the company said in a release.
